sentence.Network_en: Dryden and Pope are the great masters of the artificial style of poetry in English language.
sentence.Network_cn: 德莱顿和蒲伯是英语诗歌中人为风格的巨匠.

sentence.Network_en: The Augustan age of English literature includes the writers Dryden, Swift and Pope.
sentence.Network_cn: 在英国文学的全盛时期里有德莱顿 、 斯威夫特和蒲柏等文豪.

sentence.Network_en: For he was great, ere fortune made him so ( John Dryden )
sentence.Network_cn: 他天生是个伟大的人物 ( 约翰德赖登 )

list.abs: 如德莱顿(John Dryden)曾把逐字逐句的翻译比作“戴着镣铐跳舞”;杨绛也说,译者从事的工作是“一仆二主”的事情,即译者这个“仆人”不仅要.
